About the Company: Plastiblends India Ltd is Indias largest manufacturer and exporter of masterbatches and additive compounds for the plastic processing industry.The product range of the company includes White Masterbatches,Black Masterbatches,Color Masterbatches,Additive Masterbatches,Speciality Masterbatches,Conductive Compound and Filler.Their range of Additive Masterbatches include :Slip Additives, Antioxidants, Antiblocking Agents, Antistatic Agents, Antifibrillation Agents, Ultraviolet Absorbers, Blowing Agents, Nucleating Agents, Optical Brightner and Special Additives.
